mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ( SELECT COUNT( `name` ) FROM t_user WHERE type_id = 1 OR type_id = 2) AS numberSchool, ( SELECT COUNT( id ) FROM t_access ) AS numberAccess, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM t_user WHERE type_id = 1 AND state = 1 ) AS numberTeacher, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM t_user WHERE type_id = 2 AND state = 1 ) AS numberStudent FROM t_user

SELECT FLOOR(HOUR(t_access.scan_code_time)/2)*2 'hour', SUM(t_access.qr_id = 1) entrance1, SUM(t_access.qr_id = 2) export1, SUM(t_access.qr_id = 3) export2, SUM(t_access.qr_id = 5) entrance2, SUM(t_access.qr_id = 6) export3 FROM t_access LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_access.user_id = t_user.id LEFT JOIN t_qr ON t_access.qr_id = t_qr.id LEFT JOIN t_type ON t_type.id = t_user.type_id GROUP BY FLOOR(HOUR(t_access.scan_code_time)/2)*2 ORDER BY HOUR(t_access.scan_code_time)
